data.title: Finely penned Document signed 'Charles', in French with translation, (1839-1914, from 1866 ruling Prince, from 1881 King of Romania) by CAROL I: (1869)
data.meta_description: 1869 - to the President of Peru, (José Balta, 1816-1872, President from 1868), announcing his marriage on 15th November to Princess Elisabeth of Wied (1843-1916, the poet 'Carmen Sylva'), at Neuwied Castle, and saying he wishes to form "ties of friendship" with Peru, 2 sides folio and conjugate blank, Bucharest, 30th November - Finely penned Document signed 'Charles', in French with translation, (1839-1914, from 1866 ruling Prince, from 1881 King of Romania)
data.text:
About this Item

to the President of Peru, (José Balta, 1816-1872, President from 1868), announcing his marriage on 15th November to Princess Elisabeth of Wied (1843-1916, the poet 'Carmen Sylva'), at Neuwied Castle, and saying he wishes to form "ties of friendship" with Peru, 2 sides folio and conjugate blank, Bucharest, 30th November.
